resources.string:
Arrow key: move screen cursor forward or backward around cards and buttons.
 Center/OK key: Select the card or click the buttons, make calculation. 
 Touch screen users: can directly drag and drop the cards, or click buttons
 by touching the screen with finger or stylus.
 Copyright@2010 e-gadget 
 Contact: e-gadget@live.com
Please input a valid number between 0 and 28561
Do you want to save the score of this play?
